metadata.title: CVE-2022-1174 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A potential DoS vulnerability was discovered in Gitlab CE/EE versions 13.7before 14.7.7, all versions starting from 14.8 before 14.8.5, all versionsstarting from 14.9 before 14.9.2 allowed an attacker to trigger high CPUusage via a special crafted input added in Issues, Merge requests,Milestones, Snippets, Wiki pages, etc.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
